titles.title: Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Act
Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Act
Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Act
Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Act
A bill to amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to reauthorize the Act.
Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Barrasso without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 21.

action.text: By Senator Barrasso from Committee on Environment and Public Works filed written report. Report No. 116-9.

bill.summary:
Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Act
This bill reauthorizes the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act program through FY2024.
